summary: This mod removes the need of salt for meat recipes.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wondered why a guy who kills dragons, mammoths, demons and bears need SALT in order to roast a HORSE LEG?
Well, this mod solves this problem... You don't need salt anymore to cook meat recipes.

I don't have time to work on this, but I would like to see this updated to include the DLC recipes and recipes from theÂ Cooking Expanded mod.
Anyone can modify and update this mod.
author: VyMajoris
